name: Pooploop
description:
The Game

Collect the bunnies' poops and build defense towers out of them! The poops are even used as ammo! Neat!

As they get smacked by their own poops, the bunnies will still keep trying to get in your garden but from the other way around...
...and make some babies in the process...
IS THERE EVEN A WAY TO WIN?? U=๏ x ๏=U

The Team

This is our entry to Ludum Dare 47!

Lenophie: Dev, Game Design

Pakrett: Art, Game Design

Valentin: Sound Design, Music
